subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ holiday children’s party was a tamer affair this year without Anna Benson while Omar Minaya and Willie Randolph offered a little bit of insight into what the Mets might do in the rest of the off-season.
snippet: The Mets’ holiday children’s party was a tamer affair this year without Anna Benson while Omar Minaya and Willie Randolph offered a little bit of insight into what the Mets might do in the rest of the off-season.
